welcome.p1: A french web developper competent with both front-en and back-end technologies, who likes to create customised and scalable solutions for exigent clients.

about.title: About me
about.p1: My main area of expertise is front end development but I have full-stack experience with Wordpress and also NodeJS, mainly using MySQL and MongoDB to create databases.
about.p2: I grew up and still live in the south east of France. I lived in the UK for about a year. I'm fluent in french and english and currently learning russian. I'm also a bit of gym addict, like biking and play american football at an amateur level.

section2.title: Personals
section2.p1: These are small scale projects that I worked on to pass my web developer accreditations or for my own use.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: If you have any question or want to work together, feel free to use the form below.
contact.p2: I'll get back to you as soon a possible.
